text: aye imaan waalo! bahuth badh gumaaniyo se bacho, yaqeen maano ke baaz badh gumaaniya gunaah hai aur bhedh na tatola karo aur na tum mein se koyi kisi ki ghibath kare, kya tum mein se koyi bhi apne murda bhai ka gosht khaana pasand karta hai? tum ko us se ghin aayegi aur Allah se darte raho, beshak Allah tauba qubool karne waala meherbaan hai
